alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:14PM EDT until July 20 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... South central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 813 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Horry, or 10 miles northwest of Conway, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Sunset Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Little River, Springmaid Pier, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Horry, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus and Adrian. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
